Reviews.Title: What a great camera
Reviews.Author: Trisha Morriston "Nero Wolfe and Journey Fan"
Reviews.Content: Got this camera delivered on Thursday. Two days ago. What a great camera.  Takes really great pictures, can post to Twitter, Facebook and many other social networking sites wirelessly. Great and compact.  Beautiful colors on the pictures taken.  A definate must have for people who are on the move. Wonderful for weekend trips, or long road trips to get a lot of memories.

Reviews.Title: Kodak easyshare M5350  16 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Lou 123
Reviews.Content: Takes great pictures. I like it because the photos turn out so good. I would recommend this camera to anyone.It is very compact and I love the color of it (green) It fits in your handbag very good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Gadget Queen "paws"
Reviews.Content: Love Kodak products. Eight years ago I bought my first digital Kodak camera and I have enjoyed it tremendously. There are a couple of things I don't like about the camera, but its me I just need to use it a little more and learn more about it's features. It is a great size, fits in the palm of your hand, fits inside your chest-shirt pocket. It is extremely slim fitting an takes up no room at all in your purse. I print my photo's myself and the images are great. Buy a Kodak digital camera you can't go wrong.

ProductInfo.Name: Kodak Easyshare M5350 16 MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Green)
